VIEWS_SPEC.VIEW_TEXT: (SERVER_ADD_URL,LAST_RESPONSE_TIMESTAMP,SOURCE) AS Select Distinct Server_Add_Url, Nvl(Last_Response_Timestamp,'0') Last_Response_Timestamp, Decode(Source_Type,'1','email','2','rss') Source From Ms_Rga_Channel_Details Left Outer Join Ms_Rga_Url_Latest_Timestamp Using (Server_Add_Url) Where Active = '1'
